subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams, seeking a fifth Wimbledon women’s singles title, defeated Petra Kvitova, 6-2, 7-5, to advance to the semifinals.
snippet: Serena Williams, seeking a fifth Wimbledon women’s singles title, defeated Petra Kvitova, 6-2, 7-5, to advance to the semifinals.
